channel.title: µTorrent 2.2 gets an app store
channel.description:
http://torrentfreak.com/utorrent-expands-launches-apps-and-labs-100514/ http://www.downloadsquad.com/2010/05/14/utorrent-gets-an-app-store/
The uTorrent team has released a new version of the BitTorrent client that supports extensions, or apps as they call them. The new version, codenamed Griffin, is part of the new uTorrent labs where users will get early access to new projects, including live streaming (Pheon) and remote access (Falcon).
so long, utorrent...

item.title: µTorrent 2.2 gets an app store
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:54, topic:340446”]My previous ISP offered free access to Usenet, using your maximum download speed. The only downer was that it was an 8 megabit connection. I now have a 20 megabit connection, and for about €5 a month I can get a similar plan as sppt has.

So stop whining about Usenet. It’s cheap, fast and much more reliable then torrents. Yes, it’s €5 extra, but as mentioned before most new stuff is released on Usenet first, and there’s no need to maintain a positive ratio.[/quote]
KPN I suppose?
They’ve been upgrading all lines to VDSL2 since the start of april, but my speed hasn’t changed yet. The roll-out is kinda slow but when it’s done I should get 16 mbits downstream and 2 mbits upstream.

Read full topic

item.title: µTorrent 2.2 gets an app store
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

My previous ISP offered free access to Usenet, using your maximum download speed. The only downer was that it was an 8 megabit connection. I now have a 20 megabit connection, and for about €5 a month I can get a similar plan as sppt has.

So stop whining about Usenet. It’s cheap, fast and much more reliable then torrents. Yes, it’s €5 extra, but as mentioned before most new stuff is released on Usenet first, and there’s no need to maintain a positive ratio.

Read full topic

item.title: µTorrent 2.2 gets an app store
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:52, topic:340446”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=436817.msg3210146#msg3210146 date=1274163368]

[quote author=cumescape link=topic=436817.msg3210142#msg3210142 date=1274162866]
Paying to steal the stuff you don’t want to pay for? Makes PERFECT sense.
[/quote]I heard you’re a fuckin idiot. By joining private trackers to get maximum speed you are paying too, but in time instead of money. And if you are in a stupid country where bandwidth caps exist you’ll end up paying more due to all the seeding.[/quote]
by time you mean leaving the torrent in your utorrent and letting it upload, umm ok. and what if you’re not in a stupid country where bandwidth caps exist, so pretty much . . . torrents are the way to go, okay tanks-u

[quote author=sanga282 link=topic=436817.msg3209580#msg3209580 date=1274123965]A torrent could have thousands of seeds but if they’re all running off 56kbps modems your speeds wont be amazing, not to mention they wont all connect to you at the time just be within the swarm, and your torrent client’s inherent nature is to grab from the peer swarm instead of the seed swam as its built to trade instead of leech.
[/quote]the point of private torrent sites is that u dont seed off douchebags with shitty connections[/quote]
i know but you see the point i was making

Read full topic

item.title: µTorrent 2.2 gets an app store
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

cumescape:

$300 a year for a LIMITED amount of download, seems legit. Once AGAIN THE POINT IS YOU ARE PAYING TO FUCKING PIRATE. The WHOLE point is to not use your money.

I believe you misread his post - [quote=“Speljohan, post:36, topic:340446”]a usenet setup with no speed limits or bandwidth limits costs about $25/month[/quote]
Also on what are you basing the statement that the point of piracy is to not use your money? That may be your own personal reason for piracy however you cannot validly say that that is the reason why everyone pirates.

Read full topic

item.title: µTorrent 2.2 gets an app store
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

[quote=“Teh Spede, post:47, topic:340446”][quote author=sppt link=topic=436817.msg3210575#msg3210575 date=1274215307]

Paying to steal the stuff you don’t want to pay for? Makes PERFECT sense.

People like convenience, people pay for convenience. Usenet costs, but is a major convenience. Besides, a usenet setup with no speed limits or bandwidth limits costs about $25/month, a single new game generally costs $50-60.

7,50 euros/mo for unlimited access, 600 days + retention, 50 Mbits download speed, 8 connections, ssl, 99.5% completeness, and did I mention it’s all pretty much anonymous without having to upload?
[/quote]what provider is this?[/quote]
http://eweka.nl

Read full topic

item.title: µTorrent 2.2 gets an app store
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:36, topic:340446”][quote author=cumescape link=topic=436817.msg3210142#msg3210142 date=1274162866]
Paying to steal the stuff you don’t want to pay for? Makes PERFECT sense.
[/quote]I heard you’re a fuckin idiot. By joining private trackers to get maximum speed you are paying too, but in time instead of money. And if you are in a stupid country where bandwidth caps exist you’ll end up paying more due to all the seeding.

Also, public trackers are generally shit with a few well seeded torrents and the vast majority being seeded by idiots with shitty up-speeds.

People like convenience, people pay for convenience. Usenet costs, but is a major convenience. Besides, a usenet setup with no speed limits or bandwidth limits costs about $25/month, a single new game generally costs $50-60.

Now shut the fuck up and stop being a retard[/quote]$300 a year for a LIMITED amount of download, seems legit. Once AGAIN THE POINT IS YOU ARE PAYING TO FUCKING PIRATE. The WHOLE point is to not use your money.

Just downloaded “V for Vendetta” Max speed I got was my max 1.5MB/s and average was ~940KB/s. Meaning I was downloading after than I do off of ANY server online (for free once again).

Read full topic
